scripts.start: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting the app...' && webpack serve --config webpack.config.cjs && echo 'ğŸŒŸâœ¨ App is up and running! Visit http://localhost:3000 âœ¨'
scripts.build: echo 'ğŸ”¨ Building the app...' && webpack --config webpack.config.cjs && echo 'ğŸ—ï¸âœ¨ Build completed! Your app is ready! âœ¨'
scripts.format: echo 'ğŸ–‹ï¸ Formatting code...' && prettier --write . && echo 'âœ¨ğŸ¨ Formatting completed! Your code is now beautifully formatted! âœ¨'
scripts.lint: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Linting code...' && eslint . --ext .js,.ts,.tsx --ignore-path .eslintignore && echo 'âœ… Linting completed!'
scripts.precommit: echo 'ğŸ”’ Precommit: Linting and testing code...' && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.debug: echo 'ğŸ Starting the app in debug mode...' && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect src/index.tsx
scripts.clean: echo 'ğŸ§½ Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist && rm package-lock.json
scripts.deploy: echo 'ğŸš€ Deploying the app...' && gh-pages -d dist --repo https://${GITHUB_ACTOR}:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/Jagoda11/pokemon-react-app.git && echo 'ğŸŒŸâœ¨ App is deployed! Visit https://Jagoda11.github.io/pokemon-react-app âœ¨'
